body:

> what's your kernel version?

$ uname -a
Linux ppbeacon 2.6.35.3-670-g914558e #1 PREEMPT Thu Aug 15 09:55:00 PDT 2013 armv5tejl

platform?

Yes, it hangs immediately and pegs the CPU.
